Data: Hopes to Smith, OUT Hopes strikes! Just a fraction short outside off, Smith comes down the pitch while simultaneously giving himself some room, slashes hard but gets a thick edge, actually off the bottom of the bat straight to Haddin who accepts it gleefully
Hopes to Kallis, no run good length outside off and moving away, left alone to the keeper
Hopes to Kallis, no run back of a length outside off, shaping away from the right hander, left alone
Hopes to Kallis, no run probing him outside off, defended off the front foot to cover
Hopes to Kallis, no run fuller on the off stump, gets his foot forward and bunts it to cover

Hopes to Kallis, 1 run full on middle and leg, flicked away straight to midwicket where Ponting, unnecessarily throws down the stumps at the strikers end to allow the batsmen a single off the ricochet
Harwood to Kallis, no run bowls according to his field, short of a good length outside off, a hint of movement away from the batsman, left alone
Harwood to Kallis, 1 run short and wide, chops it down to third man for a single
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run a touch fuller outside off, bowled at 145.6 kmph, Gibbs charges down and tries to drag that wide of mid-on, mistimes it but gets a single nevertheless
Harwood to Kallis, 1 run full on middle and leg, turned away wide of mid-on for a single, the crowd cheer their team reaching fifty
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 wide banged in short on the off stump, a bouncer, a harmless one though, too high and the umpire calls it
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run shortish outside off, pulled away towards deep midwicket who runs well to his left and fields well to keep them down to a single
Harwood to Kallis, no run full on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off, all style there from Kallis but no runs, not a criticism that, perhaps he didn't intend to hit that for a boundary
Hopes to Gibbs, no run short on middle, tries to pull it behind square, struck high on the pads
Hopes to Gibbs, 2 runs full outside off, opens the face to guide it really fine, wide of the keeper for a couple
Hopes to Gibbs, no run on middle and leg and angling in, driven towards midwicket
Hopes to Gibbs, FOUR runs good length outside off, makes room, charges down and drives it over mid-off, beautifully timed
Hopes to Gibbs, no run back of a length on middle, tucked away to square leg
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run good length on middle and leg, driven firmly through the line but towards a ready long-on who cuts it off and keeps them to just a single.
Harwood to Gibbs, FOUR runs Harwood bangs that in short outside off and Gibbs treats that the way it should be, rocks back and hammers it wide of mid-on
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run short again but not as much as the previous ball, guided down to third man for a single
Harwood to Kallis, no run full outside off and a touch of away movement, Kallis goes for a blazing drive through the covers but is beaten by the movement
Harwood to Kallis, no run good length on middle and off, pushed to cover off the front foot
Harwood to Kallis, 1 run held it back this time, cut away to third man for a single
Harwood to Gibbs, no run good bouncer banged in short on middle, Kallis ducks under it well, Harwood stares intently but one isn't sure if Kallis reacted
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run back of a length on the off stump, dabbed short of point for a quick single
Hopes to Gibbs, no run
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 leg bye slower ball bowled short on middle, fails to spot it and is already into an attempted pull behind square, is hit on the shoulder

Hopes to Kallis, no run full and wide, comes down the track and mistimes an attempted loft over mid-on just wide of the bowler, one could hear the four-letter word pretty clearly after that delivery, it may just have been the batsman for having missed out
Hopes to Kallis, no run good length on middle and off, pushed to cover off the front foot
Hopes to Kallis, no run much fuller and he eases into the shot, reaching forward and playing it straight to cover
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run Slower ball bowled short of a length outside off, rolls his wrists over it to play it behind point for a single
Harwood to Kallis, no run Kallis plays and misses for the umpteenth time, slightly short of a length and he tries to cut that monstrously over point, misses
Harwood to Kallis, 1 run short of a length outside off, run down wide of slip for a single to third man
Harwood to Gibbs, no run not too short but goes for the cut anyway, gets an under-edge to the keeper
Harwood to Gibbs, no run fired it in on the off stump from wide of the crease, slightly short, defended off the back foot in the direction of cover
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run full on the off stump, opens the face and the last moment to ease it to third man
Bracken to Gibbs, no run short of a good length on the off, defended towards cover off the back foot
Bracken to Gibbs, 2 runs attempts a Dougie Marillier paddle-scoop, earns him a couple, fine leg is slightly wide
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run slightly short on the off stump, punched wide of a diving cover for a single to long-off
Bracken to Kallis, SIX runs imperious! Full outside off, he takes a couple of steps and lofts it well over the long-off boundary, struck through the line and timed perfectly, went a long way
Bracken to Kallis, FOUR runs short outside leg stump and Kallis just helps that to the fine-leg boundary, easily done and Bracken's return into the attack has proved costly
Bracken to Kallis, no run better, on and outside off, defended watchfully to cover
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run fullish on the off stump, bunts it wide of cover for a single
Harwood to Kallis, no run short of a good length outside off, made room and tried to chop it wide of point ,missed
Harwood to Kallis, 1 wide calls it a wide, a patchy decision that, wasn't too wide of the off stump, swung away as Kallis let it go
Harwood to Kallis, 1 run short on leg stump, tries to defend it off the back foot but is struck on the ribs, the ball drops dead short of square leg and they scamper a quick run
Harwood to Gibbs, no run attempted yorker, Gibbs made room to strike that through the covers but adjusted well to the length to dig it out to cover
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run full on the off stump, driven through to deep cover for a single

Harwood to Kallis, OUT Harwood gets his maiden ODI wicket! Banged in short outside off, Kallis times that a little too well for his liking, upper-cuts it straight to third man, who's right at the edge waiting for it and takes a well-judged catch bending forward
Bracken to Gibbs, no run good length on the off stump, defended off the front foot to cover
Bracken to Gibbs, no run back of a length on the off, punched wide of cover but some sharp fielding by Hauritz who dives well to is left, prevents a single
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run short of a length outside off, guided wide of point towards third man
Bracken to de Villiers, no run full outside off, gets forward and guides it to point
Bracken to de Villiers, no run back of a length on the off stump, defended in front of cover

Bracken to de Villiers, 1 run full on middle and off, a hint of away movement, plays inside the line to that but but is saved by the outside edge, the ball rolls wide of point and they manage a single
Harwood to de Villiers, 1 run on middle and leg, dropped into the leg side short of the bowler for a single
Harwood to Gibbs, 2 runs bowled full on the off stump from wide of the crease, driven firmly between long-off and deep cover for a couple, he's on 47 now
Harwood to Gibbs, no run a slower bouncer, Gibbs spotted it and tried to help it to fine leg but it was a touch too high
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run low full toss on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler who fails to hold on while diving forward and allows a single
Harwood to de Villiers, no run short of a length on the off stump, chopped to point off the back foot
Harwood to de Villiers, 1 run full on middle and leg, tucked through the vacant on-side field for a single
Bracken to de Villiers, 2 runs well played, bowled short on middle, de Villiers is down the track, makes room and guides that wide of a diving Clarke at point for a couple
Bracken to de Villiers, FOUR runs short and wide and he gets four this time, bends low and cuts it between point and cover for a boundary to bring up the South African 100
Bracken to de Villiers, 1 run fullish on the off stump, square-driven wide of cover for a single, a fielder's been pushed back
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run slower ball bowled full on the off stump, guided to third man, played with really soft hands
Bracken to de Villiers, no run short of a good length on the off stump, defended solidly in the direction of cover
Bracken to de Villiers, 1 run back of a length on the off, coming on nicely to de Villiers, punched to deep cover, good bounce
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run does well to give Gibbs the strike, stump-to-stump, on middle and off, dropped short of the bowler for a quick single

Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run on middle and leg, closes the face to work it towards fine leg for a single to bring up his 37th ODI half-century, it's been a steady innings. He started off slowly but opened up gradually to keep South Africa going on a competitive pitch
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run short of a length on leg stump, whipped away to fine leg
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run driven back past the bowler for a single to long-on
Hopes to de Villiers, no run
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run fullish on the off stump, pushed between point and cover for a single
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run low full toss on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Hauritz to Gibbs, no run flighted on the off stump, is a little too early into the short, almost gets a leading edge to the bowler as the ball spins in
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 run handles it well this time, walks across and driven wide of midwicket for a single
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, bunts it to deep square leg for a single

Hauritz to Gibbs, 2 leg byes appeal for lbw, fired in quick and full on the off and it spun in, Gibbs got a long way across to sweep it fine, was struck on the pads but perhaps just a slightly outside the line, too close to call, the ball rolls down wide of short fine
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 run quicker one bowled full again, but outside off this time, swatted wide of midwicket for a single
Hopes to Gibbs, 2 runs fullish outside off, driven firmly between long-off and deep cover for a couple
Hopes to Gibbs, no run good length on the off stump, defended to cover
Hopes to Gibbs, 2 runs cheeky, just a fraction wide of the off stump, waits for it and turns the face and the last moment to clip it wide of fine leg
Hopes to Gibbs, 2 runs struck well and through the gap between mid-off and cover, for the second time in the over, two more
Hopes to Gibbs, no run full on the off stump, tries to turn it away wide of square, mistimes it and the ball lands dead on the off side

Hopes to Gibbs, 2 runs missed runout, risky, tries to drive it wide of cover, gets a thick inside edge behind square, scampers back for the second but the throw from the deep is a good one, just evades the stump by a whisker and had that hit, Gibbs was a gonner
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run full outside off, steered wide of point for a single
Hauritz to Gibbs, no run
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 run whipped away off the pads behind square for a run
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run flat and short on the off stump, turning in sharply, worked away towards deep square leg
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 run full on middle, gets front and across and flicks it into the deep on the leg side for a single
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run flighted on the off stump, drives it wristily wide of midwicket
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run back of a length on the off, dropped into the leg side wide of the bowler for quick single
Hopes to Gibbs, no run short of a length, Hopes slips and falls badly on the follow through, the ball bounces over him towards mid-off
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run on the stumps this time, clipped off his pads to fine leg
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run almost had him there, good length on middle and he lofted it lazily over the in-field to just about evade mid-on
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run full outside off, slapped towards mid-off for a quick single
Hopes to de Villiers, no run full on the off, eased to cover, just a defense without much intent
Hauritz to Gibbs, no run quicker one bowled full on the off stump, pushed to midwicket
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 run slower through the air, on middle and leg, turned away wide of short fine

Hauritz to de Villiers, SIX runs was waiting for it for ages and cashed in when the opportunity presented itself, tossed up on middle, down the track, takes it on the full and deposits it over the long-on boundary with a golf swing
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run flighted on the off, pushed back firmly to the bowler
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run slightly short on middle and off, turned away to fine leg
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 run tossed up on the off stump, pushed wide of cover for a single
Clarke to Gibbs, no run flat and slightly short on middle, pushed back to the bowler
Clarke to Gibbs, 1 run tossed up on the off stump, paddled behind square for a single
Clarke to de Villiers, 1 run full on the off stump, driven through the line to long-off
Clarke to Gibbs, 1 run fullish on middle and leg, driven wristily towards deep midwicket
Clarke to de Villiers, 1 run
Clarke to Gibbs, no run dipping into the right hander, flat on middle, holding its line, driven back to the bowler
Johnson to de Villiers, no run bringing it back into the right hander, good length on the off stump and moving back in, turned wide of square leg
Johnson to de Villiers, no run full and wide but de Villiers doesn't go after it, leaves it alone
Johnson to de Villiers, no run full outside off, tries to drive it through the line wide of mid-off, mistimes it back to the bowler
Johnson to de Villiers, no run fullish on the off stump, defended solidly to cover, good over so far
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run back of a length on the off, turned away wide of midwicket for a single, first runs off the over
Johnson to Gibbs, no run bouncer banged in short on middle, tries to pull it behind square but it's onto him a lot quicker than expected, misses
Clarke to de Villiers, 1 run flat and quick on the off stump, chipped wide of deep cover for a single
Clarke to Gibbs, no run good length on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
Clarke to Gibbs, no run flighted on the off stump, driven to cover, these dot balls can be frustrating
Clarke to Gibbs, no run
Clarke to Gibbs, 1 run gets forward and guides it wide of short third man for a single
Clarke to de Villiers, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, driven off the front foot wide of deep square leg
Johnson to de Villiers, no run full on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run back of a length on middle, turned wide of midwicket off the back foot for a single
Johnson to Gibbs, 1 run short outside off, makes room and swats it back past the bowler for a single wide of mid-off, 150 up
Johnson to de Villiers, no run swinging into the right hander, full on the off stump and driven to mid-on
Johnson to de Villiers, no run yorker on middle, dug out wide of the bowler to mid-on again
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run fullish outside off, caressed through the off side towards deep cover for a single
Clarke to de Villiers, 2 runs there's that chip over cover again but is into the gap this time, between long-off and deep cover for a well-timed couple
Clarke to de Villiers, 1 leg bye quick on middle and leg, clips his pads and rolls wide of midwicket
Clarke to Gibbs, 2 runs low full toss on the off stump, driven firmly past the bowler wide of long-off for a couple
Clarke to Gibbs, SIX runs atrocious ball and gets the treatment, waist-high full toss on middle, pulled away into the stands behind deep midwicket
Clarke to Gibbs, 1 run eased into the off side wide of cover for a single
Clarke to de Villiers, FOUR runs fired in quick down the leg side, gets a faint tickle as he tries to sweep, proves effective as it beats the short-fine fielder to the fine-leg boundary
Hauritz to Gibbs, no run pushed into the off side towards cover
Hauritz to Gibbs, SIX runs quicker ball bowled full on the off stump, steps down the pitch, fetches it from the off and dismisses that into the stands behind long-on, a massive hit that
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 run tucked away into the leg side for a single
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run driven off the front foot towards midwicket
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run flighted on the off stump, flicked away but straight to midwicket
Bracken to Gibbs, no run full on the off stump, driven through the line to cover

Bracken to Gibbs, 2 runs full on the off stump, a hint of aggression in that shot as he tries to force that wide of cover, succeeds in doing so, it takes a while for long-off to run across and cut that off and they manage a couple
Bracken to Gibbs, FOUR runs Gibbs in fine flow here, just a fraction full on the off stump, he drills that down the ground past Bracken, no chance for long-off to cut that one
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run follows that up with a gentle dab wide of point for a single

Bracken to de Villiers, 1 run full outside off, stroked firmly and crisply to deep cover, good sound of bat hitting ball but there's a fielder in the deep so he'll have to reconcile himself with just a single
Bracken to Gibbs, no run slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, an offcutter, guided to point
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run quicker one bowled on a good length on the off stump, comes down the track and chips it to long-on
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 leg bye tossed up, lands fullish on the off stump, spins in to strike him high on the pads as he tries to sweep it square, was going down
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run short of a length on middle, pulled away to square leg, will feel he missed out there

Hauritz to de Villiers, SIX runs in the slot, tossed up on middle, is down the track and smashes it powerfully over the bowlers head for a flat six, hit the advertising hoardings near the sight screen and darted back onto the field
Hauritz to de Villiers, SIX runs bigger, similar length, still gave it some air, de Villiers got stuck into it, launching that one well over deep midwicket to bring up his 18th ODI fifty
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run
Harwood to Gibbs, FOUR runs South Africa on the move here, just a fraction full outside off, charges down and swats that wide of mid-off. He's on 98 now

Harwood to Gibbs, 2 runs short on middle and off, pulled away uppishly between long-on and deep midwicket, brings up his 21st ODI century, and we can expect him to 0pen up even more now that he's reached his landmark
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run short of a good length outside off, slashed away to third man
Harwood to de Villiers, 1 run short and wide, chopped down to deep point
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run fullish on the off stump, square-drives it to deep point off the front foot
Harwood to de Villiers, 1 run short on leg stump, paddled down to fine leg
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run bowled flat on middle, driven through the line back to the bowler

Hauritz to de Villiers, FOUR runs dropped, flighted on middle, comes down the track and strikes it wide of a diving Ferguson at long-on, it's a touch chance, bending and stretching low to his left, fails to hold on and dabs it over the ropes
Hauritz to de Villiers, 2 runs pushed off the front foot between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 run flicked away to deep square leg, full on middle and leg
Hauritz to de Villiers, no run full and straight, driven firmly back to the bowler, Hauritz is quick to react and fields well
Harwood to Gibbs, 2 runs full toss on the off stump, driven wide of deep cover for two more
Harwood to Gibbs, no run shuffled across to paddle it fine but it's not full enough, adjusts well to play it to midwicket
Harwood to Gibbs, no run will feel he missed out there, low full toss on the off stump, played straight to cover
Harwood to Gibbs, no run slower bouncer banged in on middle, Gibbs backs away, a little too high but the umpire decides against calling that a wide
Harwood to Gibbs, 1 run full on the off stump, makes room and strikes it down the ground to long-off
Harwood to de Villiers, 1 run neatly struck but straight to deep cover, a textbook drive that, full and straight on the off stump and hit through the line, all that for just a run
Bracken to de Villiers, 1 run short on middle, gets back and punches it to long-on
Bracken to Gibbs, FOUR runs slower ball bowled flat outside leg stump, a horrible delivery that, picked cleanly over short fine, anything less than a four and Gibbs would have lost it

Bracken to Gibbs, OUT he goes, after an excellent knock! Bracken pushed it full this time, on middle, Gibbs made room and attempted to loft that over long-on, timed it well but not well enough, found Clarke in the deep who took it comfortably
Bracken to de Villiers, 1 run bowled on the pads, clipped wide of square leg for a single
Bracken to Morkel, no run short of a good length on the off stump, punched off the back foot towards cover
Bracken to Morkel, 2 runs short of a length on the off stump, makes room and swats it wide of deep point
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run tossed up on middle, driven off the front foot to long-on
Hauritz to Morkel, no run fired in on middle and leg from round the wicket, turned wide of midwicket but fails to get the single
Hauritz to Morkel, 1 run flat on the off stump, dropped short of point for a single
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, eased through the off side for a single
Hauritz to Morkel, 1 run quicker one on the off stump, guided wide of point for a quick run
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run
Johnson to de Villiers, no run length ball outside off, struck from the crease to cover
Johnson to de Villiers, FOUR runs full on middle and leg, flicked away firmly behind square, there's a wide gap between square leg and short fine and he finds it perfectly to earn a boundary
Johnson to de Villiers, no run full on middle and leg, driven straight to midwicket
Johnson to de Villiers, FOUR runs full on the off stump, shuffles across slightly, picks it up cleanly to cart it over mid-on for the second four of the over
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run low full toss outside off, makes room and slices it just short of short third man

Johnson to Morkel, OUT bowled'im! Came back in after landing on a good length outside off, Morkel tried to guide that to third man from the crease but was late into the shot, the ball jagged back in sharply to beat his bat and clip off stump
Hopes to de Villiers, FOUR runs the runs keep flowing, full outside leg stump, a poor ball in the circumstances, glances it fine, no difficulty there
Hopes to de Villiers, no run full on middle and off, pushed firmly but straight to cover
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run good length on middle and off, driven through the line to long-off
Hopes to Boucher, no run good length on the off stump, pushed firmly back to the bowler and Hopes does well, diving forward to field it on his follow through
Hopes to Boucher, no run
Hopes to Boucher, 1 run length ball on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-off for a single to keep the strike
Johnson to Boucher, no run on middle and leg, pushed watchfully to Johnson
Johnson to Boucher, FOUR runs slower ball bowled full outside off, a touch too wide, Boucher reaches for it and drives it crisply between cover and cover point for his first boundary
Johnson to Boucher, 1 wide too wide, the batsman stretches to get his bat to it but doesn't connect
Johnson to Boucher, 1 run good length on the off stump, pushed wide of cover for a single

Johnson to de Villiers, OUT bowled on a good length on middle and leg, not quite full for the waft over midwicket that de Villiers was attempting, mistimed it completely and Ferguson at mid-on ran a couple of yards to his left to snap a well-judged catch
Johnson to Boucher, no run full on middle, driven back to the bowler
Johnson to Boucher, no run slower ball bowled slightly short on the off stump, dabbed to point off the back foot
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run pitched up on the off stump, struck neatly down the ground to long-off
Hopes to Boucher, 1 run full on middle, turned to midwicket who's a little deep inside the circle so they manage a comfortable single
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run short of a length outside off, run down to third man
Hopes to Boucher, 1 run yorker on middle, dug out wide of a diving Hopes to long-on

Hopes to Duminy, 3 runs he's done it before and commits the same mistake again, bowls a meaty length ball outside leg stump, Duminy clips it wide of short fine, Bracken gives chase, drags it back inside the ropes, only just, and the batsmen manage three
Hopes to Boucher, no run full on the off stump, driven firmly but straight to cover
Johnson to Duminy, 1 run swinging into the left hander, landed full on the off stump and moved in towards middle, pushed firmly to long-on
Johnson to Boucher, 1 wide straying down the leg side, given a wide
Johnson to Boucher, 1 run slower ball bowled on a good length on leg stump, turned away to midwicket who's right at the circle
Johnson to Duminy, 1 run straying on the pads again but gets away with it, clipped towards short fine, fails to beat the fielder there ans settles for a single
Johnson to Boucher, no run full and wide, he's made too much room even before the ball's been delivered and struggles to reach it when its fired in wide of the off stump
Johnson to Boucher, no run beaten, landed on a good length outside off and moved away sharply to beat the batsman as he tried to prod at it from the crease
Johnson to Boucher, no run the end of a good over, this one came in, cramped Boucher for room and all he could do was defend it respectfully to the bowler
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards mid-off for a single
Hopes to Boucher, 1 run yorker length on middle and leg, gets a thick outside edge as he tries to dig it out in the direction of midwicket, gets a single towards deep cover
Hopes to Duminy, FOUR runs short of a length on middle and off, paddles it away wide of fine leg, there's cover in the deep but it's in the gap
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run full on middle and off, drilled down the ground to long-off
Hopes to Boucher, SIX runs meaty length ball on middle, Boucher is quick to pounce on it, slogs it away into the stands behind deep midwicket
Hopes to Boucher, no run struck away to midwicket this time, persists with a slightly fuller length, but gets away with it this time

Bracken to Duminy, 2 runs dropped, slower ball outside off, Duminy strikes it cleanly wide of Johnson at long-on, he runs to his left and reaches for it but spills it just short of the ropes, a tough chance but should have been snapped
Bracken to Duminy, 1 run full and wide, played wide of cover for a single
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run yorker length on middle, dug out into the off side for a single
Bracken to Duminy, 1 run full on the off stump, stroked through the in-field towards deep cover
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run full on middle, dug out towards midwicket
Bracken to Duminy, 1 run low full toss on the off stump, struck towards midwicket again, who's at the edge of the circle, allowing the batsmen run through for quick single
Harwood to Duminy, 2 runs dropped, the third of the innings and probably the simplest of the lot, full on the off, lofted towards long-on where Hauritz running forward spilled a comfi
Harwood to Duminy, no run attempts a square-drive wide of point, gets a thick inside edge back to the bowler
Harwood to Duminy, 1 run low full toss on the off stump, reaches for it, dabs it wide of cover for a single
Harwood to Boucher, 1 run full on the off stump, dragged towards long-on from the crease
Harwood to Duminy, 2 runs full on middle and off, bunts it wide of deep midwicket for a couple
Harwood to Duminy, 1 run short of a length outside off, makes room and slaps it towards deep cover
Johnson to Duminy, 1 run banged in short on leg stump, pulled away to deep square leg, inching towards 300 now
Johnson to Boucher, FOUR runs slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, makes room and strikes it uppishly wide of a diving Clarke at mid-off
Johnson to Boucher, FOUR runs Boucher opening up now, length ball on the off stump, slogged over midwicket for a one bounce four, straying in length here
Johnson to Boucher, 1 run full and wide, makes room and bunts it to deep cover to bring up the 300 for his team

Johnson to Duminy, FOUR runs Duminy into the act now, length ball again, attempting a yorker but not getting it right, Duminy moves his right foot out of the way and thumps that down the ground to beat a diving long-on
Johnson to Duminy, 1 run low full toss on the off stump, driven to long-on for a single to keep the strike in the final over
Harwood to Duminy, 1 leg bye round the wicket and full on the pads, tries to hoick it over midwicket but makes no contact, is struck on the pads and they steal a leg bye
Harwood to Boucher, 1 run short of a length on the off stump, heaved away towards deep square leg
Harwood to Duminy, FOUR runs poor ball, full toss on middle and Duminy has not trouble dispatching it to the deep-midwicket boundary, a hard-hit pull and the ball raced way
Harwood to Duminy, 2 runs low full toss on leg stump, struck in the same direction but all along the ground this time, two more
Harwood to Duminy, FOUR runs overpitched and he's made that midwicket region his pet area, full on the off stump and he smacks it cleanly to bisect the gap between long-on and deep midwicket

Harwood to Duminy, OUT comes back well with a wicket off the last ball, short on middle and off, pulled away well but straight to Hussey at deep square leg who dives forward running in to take a sharp catch

South Africa have done superbly to reach 317, considering their sedate start and some good bowling by the Australians early on. The innings was set up by the 136-run third-wicket stand between Gibbs and de Villiers. After both fell, Boucher and Duminy, after a shaky start in the last ten overs, did incredibly well at the death to
The openers are out in the middle. Steyn will start the proceedings for South Africa, and facing him is Haddin. Two slips in place.
Steyn to Haddin, 2 wide straying down the leg side, false start, Boucher dives full length to his left and does well to concede just two wides
Steyn to Clarke, 1 run off the mark straightaway, good length on the off stump, pushed wide of mid-off for a single
Steyn to Haddin, 1 run on middle and leg, dabbed into the leg side for a quick single
Steyn to Clarke, no run good length on the off stump and moving away sharply, left alone to the keeper
Steyn to Clarke, no run full on the pads and angling down further, tries to flick it past midwicket, misses, is struck on the pads and there's a stifled appeal
Steyn to Clarke, 2 runs good length on the off stump, pushed off the front foot wide of mid-off for a couple
Steyn to Clarke, no run back of a length on middle, a hint of movement away from the batsmen, defended solidly towards mid-off
Parnell to Haddin, no run full outside off, struck firmly off the front foot, fielded well at cover
Parnell to Haddin, no run good length on the off stump, defended watchfully into the off side
Parnell to Haddin, 3 runs goes after it, full on middle and leg, chipped well over mid-on, van der Merwe gives chase and jeeps them down to three runs
Parnell to Clarke, no run full outside off and moving away sharply, goes after it but is beaten by the swing
Parnell to Clarke, 1 run short of a good length on the off stump, guided to third man for a single
Parnell to Haddin, no run back of a length on the off stump, defended to cover
Steyn to Clarke, FOUR runs nicely done, just a fraction short outside off, makes room and punches it firmly through the covers, is getting into his groove here
Steyn to Clarke, no run back of a length on the off, pushed to cover off the back foot
Steyn to Clarke, no run good length on the off stump, defended to mid-off on the front foot
Steyn to Clarke, no run good length on the off stump and darting back in, gets outside the line to work it behind square, gets an inside edge onto his pads
Steyn to Clarke, no run back of a length on the off stump, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
Steyn to Clarke, no run slower ball, misdirected, is down the leg side but clips Clarke's pads on the way to the keeper
Parnell to Haddin, FOUR runs stunned silence around the ground as Haddin drills this one fiercely past mid-off to the boundary, was in the slot though, full on the off stump and he freed his arms
Parnell to Haddin, no run much better, came back in after landing on a good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
Parnell to Haddin, 1 run short on middle again, gets back and works it in front of mid-on for a quick single
Parnell to Clarke, FOUR runs short and wide, slashes hard, gets a thick outside edge past a diving third man, a good enough start for Australia here
Parnell to Clarke, no run full on middle and seaming away from the right hander, gets his front foot across and tries to drive through the line, ends up slicing it wide of short cover
Parnell to Clarke, 1 run full on the off, gets forward and drives it towards a deepish mid-off for a single
Steyn to Clarke, no run banged in short outside off, rocks back to dismiss it over midwicket, misses, a massive heave that and would have disappeared had he connected, a touch too quick perhaps
Steyn to Clarke, 1 run good length on the off stump, pushed back past the bowlers towards mid-on for a single
Steyn to Haddin, FOUR runs short and wide, comes down the track, makes room and cuts it away over point, easily done
Steyn to Haddin, 1 run slashed hard at it but this time it goes much finer, towards third man, runs have been fairly easy come by this innings so far
Steyn to Clarke, no run back of a length on middle, gets behind to defend, gets a thick outside edge towards point
Steyn to Clarke, no run short of a good length on the off stump, whips it towards midwicket
Parnell to Haddin, 2 runs full outside off, comes forward and tries to cream that through the covers, gets an inside edge just shy of the off stump, and earns a couple towards fine leg
Parnell to Haddin, no run slightly short on the off stump, plays a short-arm pull towards midwicket
Parnell to Haddin, 1 run full on the off stump, stands tall and drives it straight to mid-off
Parnell to Clarke, 1 leg bye good length on leg stump, tries to clip it fine, is struck on the thighs and they scamper a leg bye
Parnell to Haddin, no run back of a length on the off, punched to cover
Parnell to Haddin, no run short of a length on the off, makes room and slaps that straight to mid-off
Steyn to Clarke, no run fraction short outside off and jagged back in a touch, tried to chop it down wide of point but failed to connect
Steyn to Clarke, no run full on middle and leg, driven wirstily towards midwicket, will be disappointed for not having pierced the gap
Steyn to Clarke, no run good length on the off stump, defended to cover off the back foot, calls for the single but is sent back wisely
Steyn to Clarke, no run full on the off stump and angling in from wide of the crease, defended towards cover
Steyn to Clarke, no run slower ball bowled full on middle and leg, tries to turn it away fine, brushes Clarke's pads on the way to Boucher, good over this
Steyn to Clarke, no run and it's a maiden, full on middle and leg, driven straight to Duminy at midwicket who reacts quickly to prevent a single
Parnell to Haddin, no run fullish on the off stump, pushed through to mid-off, gently
Parnell to Haddin, 1 run short of a good length on the off, dabbed towards third man for a single
Parnell to Clarke, 1 run short of a length again, bowled at 143 kmph, chopped to third man once more
Parnell to Haddin, 1 run third man in action again, back of a length outside off, gets an edge off the bottom of the bat as he tries to smash that through point
Parnell to Clarke, no run full on the off stump, driven across the line to mid-on
Parnell to Clarke, FOUR runs good length on middle and leg, shuffles and glances it down fine to beat the fielder in the deep, a gift really, had been a fairly decent over until then
Steyn to Haddin, no run short of a good length on middle, walks across and turns it behind square
Steyn to Haddin, no run fullish on the off stump, makes room and creams that to the cover fielder who's right on the edge of the circle
Steyn to Haddin, 1 run good length on the off stump, driven to mid-on for a single
Steyn to Clarke, no run bouncer on the off stump, Clarke negotiates it without any difficulty
Steyn to Clarke, no run full on the off stump, driven slightly across the line to mid-on, Morkel is alert and shies at the stumps to keep the batsmen rooted to the crease
Steyn to Clarke, 1 run made room for himself but the bowler chased him, bowled it full outside leg, Clarke punched it down the ground wide of mid-off for a single
Parnell to Clarke, no run full outside off, tries to drag and dispatch it over midwicket, a blind swipe that and promptly misses
Parnell to Clarke, 1 run short of a length on middle, paddled down to fine leg for a single
Parnell to Haddin, no run full on the off stump, driven off the front foot to mid-on
Parnell to Haddin, 1 run back of a length on the off, opens the face to guide it to third man for a single
Parnell to Clarke, 1 run short of a good length on the off, turned away wide of midwicket for a single
Parnell to Haddin, no run full on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
Kallis to Clarke, 1 run fullish on the off stump, gets forward and drives it ti mid-on for a single
Kallis to Haddin, no run back of a length on the off, turned off the back foot to midwicket
Kallis to Haddin, FOUR runs short on middle, gets across and helps it on its way wide of short fine for a boundary, brings up the 50-stand, just what they had been hoping for
Kallis to Haddin, 1 run slightly short on middle, punched wide of midwicket off the back foot
Kallis to Clarke, no run short of a length outside off, stopped on him slightly, bunted to mid-off on the back foot
Kallis to Clarke, no run well struck but straight to the fielder, full and wide, driven crisply but fails to clear the in-field
Parnell to Haddin, SIX runs That's disappeared, full, meaty, length ball on middle and off, just a slight shuffle, and clips it cleanly over the deep square-leg boundary
Parnell to Haddin, 1 run back of a length on the off stump, dabbed down to third man for a single
Parnell to Clarke, 1 run trying to bring it into the right hander, on middle and off, pushed short of mid-on for a single

Parnell to Haddin, FOUR runs Parnell's being punished here, a fraction full outside off and Haddin cashes in, swings it away over mid-on for a boundary, the crowd have had nothing to cheer in the past 40 minutes or so
Parnell to Haddin, 1 run there's a long-off in place now, full outside off and he drives it through the line into the deep
Parnell to Clarke, 1 run angling it away from the right hander from wide of the crease, eased through the covers for a single
Kallis to Clarke, 1 run full on the off stump, got to the pitch and tried to drive through the line, got a thick outside edge towards third man

Kallis to Haddin, FOUR runs the third man is up for Haddin and can only watch the ball roll down the boundary, short and wide, poor ball given the field, he just chops it behind the keeper and gets four without much effort
Kallis to Haddin, 1 run moved back in a touch, good length on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-on

Kallis to Clarke, FOUR runs third man, whether deep or inside the circle makes no difference for these two. Fullish outside off, waited for it and opened the face at the last moment to guide it delicately past the keeper and a diving third man for a boundary
Kallis to Clarke, no run full on the off stump, pushed wide of cover but fails to get the single
Kallis to Clarke, 2 runs slower ball bowled short on the off stump, pulled away wide of square leg for a couple more
Morkel to Haddin, no run back of a length on middle, dropped dead onto the pitch
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run back of a length on middle, gets back and tucks it away wide of deep square leg for a single
Morkel to Clarke, 1 wide bouncer, was in no control of it though, his fingers clipped the bails while he was bowling, went way over the batsman's head on the leg side
Morkel to Clarke, 1 run full on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off for a single
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run back of a length on middle, defended to midwicket on the back foot
Morkel to Clarke, 1 run short on middle, pulled away just short of deep square leg who takes it on the bounce, a controlled shot in the end, he knew there was someone in the deep
Morkel to Haddin, no run came back in, landed on a good length outside off and moved in to strike him on the pads off the inside edge as he tried to drive that on the up past the bowler
Kallis to Clarke, 2 runs short of a length outside off, cut away behind point, Botha gives chase from third man and dives to pull it back just inside the ropes
Kallis to Clarke, 1 run poor stuff from Kallis really, short and wide again, but gets away with just a single, cut away to straight to Botha at third man this time
Kallis to Haddin, no run back of a length on the off stump, defended with an open face to point
Kallis to Haddin, 1 run short on middle, comes down the track while making room to cart that over point, gets a thick edge to third man
Kallis to Clarke, no run slower one bowled slightly short on the off stump, defended off the back foot towards midwicket
Kallis to Clarke, 1 run full on the off stump, pushed wide of mid-off for a single
Botha to Clarke, no run tossed up on the off stump, driven to midwicket
Botha to Clarke, 1 run quicker one bowled short outside off, dabbed wide of point for a single
Botha to Haddin, no run tossed up, lands on a good length on the off stump and spins in, pushed wide of midwicket
Botha to Haddin, SIX runs Haddin reaches his fifty in style, bowled full and flat outside off and is onto it quickly, smashes it over deep midwicket for a big six

Botha to Haddin, SIX runs another one, this one was tossed up on middle and leg, waited for it, bent low and slog-swept it into the crowd over deep midwicket again, they have paced their innings superbly here
Botha to Haddin, 1 run flighted on the off stump, driven down towards long-off for a single
Kallis to Haddin, no run good length on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
Kallis to Haddin, no run short of a length outside off, chopped down to point
Kallis to Haddin, 1 wide banged in short outside leg stump, tries to pull it away fine, stifled appeal from Boucher, the umpire rewards him with a wide

Kallis to Haddin, 1 leg bye moved across quite a bit, landed on a good length on middle and struck him in line as he tried to work that behind square, would have probably knocked out leg stump but Kallis was the only one who appealed
Kallis to Clarke, no run short of a length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to point
Kallis to Clarke, no run slower offcutter on the off stump, dropped short of cover, calls for a single but is sent back

Kallis to Clarke, 1 run missed run out, Clarke was out had that hit, pushed off the back foot towards Duminy at midwicket and set off immediately, a shy at the stumps at the non-striker's end but missed, albeit only just.
van der Merwe to Clarke, 1 run bowled flat on middle and leg, driven wide of the diving bowler towards long-on
van der Merwe to Haddin, no run short of a length on the off stump and spun away, dabbed to short third man
van der Merwe to Haddin, no run flighted on the off stump, struck straight to cover

van der Merwe to Haddin, FOUR runs arm ball on middle but dealt with very well, Haddin made room and slashed that wide of point, Parnell raced to his left to drag that back just inside the ropes. Or so we thought, he made contact with the ropes just as he slid to pull it back in
van der Merwe to Haddin, 1 run on middle and off, gets to the pitch and smacks it down the ground towards long-on
van der Merwe to Clarke, no run tossed up on middle, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run good length on middle and leg, presents the full face to push it to long-on
Morkel to Clarke, no run back of a length on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
Morkel to Clarke, 1 run pushed through quicker on middle and leg, driven through the line, long-on in action again
Morkel to Haddin, FOUR runs the runs keep coming, full on middle, in the slot for Haddin who slaps who gets under it and swings it over midwicket
Morkel to Haddin, no run full on the off, driven firmly but straight to mid-off
Morkel to Haddin, 1 run feeding him with length balls here, struck back well towards Albie who gets his body in the way to prevent what would easily have been a couple more
van der Merwe to Haddin, no run quicker on the off stump, defended back onto the pitch
van der Merwe to Haddin, 1 run flat on middle and leg, driven to long-on
van der Merwe to Clarke, 2 runs fullish on the off stump, steered wide of point for a couple
van der Merwe to Clarke, 1 run on middle, flighted, comes down the track and drives it to long-on
van der Merwe to Haddin, 1 run short of a length on middle and off, punched to cover
van der Merwe to Clarke, no run quicker one on middle, defended forward with a lunge

Botha to Haddin, SIX runs ooooh, almost! Flighted outside off, bends low and swats that wide of long-on, a valiant attempt by Wayne Parnell as he flings himself to his left to pull off a miraculous catch but the ball clips his fingers and lands bang on the ropes, the agony continues for South Africa
Botha to Haddin, no run quicker one bowled full on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Botha to Haddin, no run on middle and off, struck back firmly and Botha dives well to his right to prevent a single

Botha to Haddin, OUT Parnell's snapped it this time, flighted on the off stump, Haddin is tempted and attempts to clear long-on again, doesn't strike this as well as the previous one, gets more elevation than he would have wanted and finds Parnell, who takes it gleefully just inside the ropes
Botha to Ponting, no run slightly short on the off stump, turned off the back foot behind square
Botha to Ponting, no run flighted on middle and off, defended on the leg side
van der Merwe to Clarke, 1 run quicker one on the off stump, pushed through the covers for a single
van der Merwe to Ponting, no run pushed through quick on middle, played back past Merwe who dives well to his right to save a single
van der Merwe to Ponting, no run on middle and off, pushed through to cover off the front foot
van der Merwe to Ponting, no run tucked away behind square towards short fine
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run quicker one bowled full on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
van der Merwe to Clarke, 1 run flighted on middle, comes down the track and bunts it to long-on again
Botha to Clarke, 1 run low full toss on middle, down the track and played to long-on
Botha to Ponting, no run spinning in sharply, landed on a good length outside off, defended off the back foot
Botha to Ponting, no run gets forward and pushes it back towards Botha
Botha to Ponting, no run runs not as easy to come by now, tossed up on middle, defended cautiously on the leg side
Botha to Ponting, no run short of a length outside off, late-cuts it straight to short third
Botha to Ponting, 1 run quicker through the air, full on the off stump, presents the full face to push it down to long-off
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run good length on middle and leg, gets the leading edge as he tries to push it down the leg side
van der Merwe to Clarke, 2 runs bowled full outside off, comes down the track and slices that wide of cover for a couple more, fifty up for Clarke, he played an excellent supporting role to Haddin

van der Merwe to Clarke, OUT he's gone now and South Africa have struck back with two quick wickets, forced much quicker through the air, landed on a good length on middle and spun away sharply, Clarke was beaten by the pace as well as the spin to watch is offstump pegged back

van der Merwe to Ferguson, no run angling towards middle from wide of the crease, gets outside the line to push it into the leg side, struck on the pads, stifled appeal but we know that can't be given
van der Merwe to Ferguson, 1 run
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run worked away to deep square leg for a single
Botha to Ponting, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards long-on
Botha to Ferguson, no run short of a length on middle and leg, worked to short fine
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run flighted on middle, chipped past the bowler to long-on
Botha to Ponting, 2 runs short of a length outside off and spinning in, cut away wide of point for a couple
Botha to Ponting, 1 run tossed up on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-on
Botha to Ferguson, 1 run short on the off, walks across and turns it away to deep square leg

van der Merwe to Ferguson, OUT spin does the trick again, van der Merwe has turned this game around, similar ball to the one that got Clarke but bowled outside the off stump this time, Ferguson stepped out of his crease to play it into the off side but was done in by the sharp spin away from him, Boucher collected it clean
van der Merwe to Hussey, no run over the wicket to the left hander, on middle and off, turned away into the leg side
van der Merwe to Hussey, no run tossed up on middle and leg, tries to sweep it behind square, misses, is struck on the pads
van der Merwe to Hussey, 1 run quicker one on the off stump, coming in sharply, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
van der Merwe to Ponting, no run on middle and off, Ponting handles the spin well, getting behind it and dropping it on the leg side
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run short on the off stump, punched off the back foot to deep cover
Botha to Ponting, 1 run short of a length on middle, pulled away to deep square leg
Botha to Hussey, no run short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot wide of de Villiers at cover who dives full length to his right to save a couple, the buzz is back at the ground now
Botha to Hussey, no run good length on middle, pushed into the leg side
Botha to Hussey, 1 run low full toss on the off stump, driven down to long-on for a single
Botha to Ponting, no run flighted on the off stump, reaches forward to defend it back to the bowler
Botha to Ponting, 1 run short of a length outside off, cut away towards deep cover
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, pushed into the off side towards deep cover
van der Merwe to Hussey, no run flighted outside off, gets outside the line to bunt it towards deep midwicket, is struck on the pads
van der Merwe to Hussey, no run flighted on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler

van der Merwe to Hussey, OUT van der Merwe you beauty! Flatter, following up on three flighted deliveries, landed just a fraction outside off stump and turned in towards Hussey to rap him on the pads as he got onto the back foot to work it behind square. Replays indicate he was struck in line with leg stump
van der Merwe to Hussey, no run flighted on the off stump, pushed to cover
van der Merwe to Hussey, no run tossed up on middle, lunges forward to defend on the leg side
Botha to Ponting, 1 run back of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to deep cover
Botha to Hussey, no run tossed up on middle and off, driven straight to midwicket
Botha to Hussey, no run quicker on the off stump, dropped into the off side short of point
Botha to Hussey, 1 run flighted outside off, closes the face to drive it towards long-on
Botha to Ponting, 2 runs flighted on the off stump, driven through the line between deep cover and long-off

Botha to Ponting, no run rapped on the pads and Botha lets out a war cry, spun in from outside off to get Ponting on the pads as he tried to work it away on the leg side, was probably caught high on the knee roll and it could have even missed leg But worth an appeal though, replays, as they always do, make it appear much c
van der Merwe to Hussey, no run
van der Merwe to Hussey, 1 run on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run
van der Merwe to Hussey, 2 runs driven between long-off and deep cover for a couple more
van der Merwe to Hussey, 1 run pushed off the back foot towards long-off
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 wide fired in down the leg side, tries to sweep but misses
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run short on leg stump, whipped away off the back foot towards deep square leg
Botha to Ponting, no run short of a length on the off stump, punched to cover on the back foot
Botha to Ponting, no run quicker one on middle, defended back to the bowler
Botha to Ponting, no run short of a length outside off, and spinning in, guided to short third
Botha to Ponting, no run short on middle and leg, turned straight to square leg
Botha to Ponting, no run quicker ball fired in full on middle, dug out towards midwicket
Botha to Ponting, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, driven off the front foot towards deep midwicket
van der Merwe to Ponting, no run good length on the off stump, defended towards cover
van der Merwe to Ponting, no run the runs have dried up now, defended with a reach to cover once again
van der Merwe to Ponting, 2 runs quicker ball bowled full on the off stump, chipped over cover between long-off and deep cover for a couple
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run short of a length on the off stump, eased wide of point for another run
van der Merwe to Hussey, 1 run short on middle and leg, turned away behind square for a single
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run short of a length outside off, cut away towards deep cover
Botha to Ponting, no run back of a length on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
Botha to Ponting, no run flighted on middle, gets across and flicks it behind square for a single
Botha to Ponting, 1 run short of a length outside off, cut away behind point for a single
Botha to Hussey, no run back of a length outside off, chopped to cover
Botha to Hussey, 1 run tucked away behind square for a single
Botha to Ponting, 1 run flighted on middle, drilled down the ground to long-on
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run good length on middle, pushed with an full face past Morkel towards long-on
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven firmly towards long-on for a single
Morkel to Ponting, no run short of a good length on the off stump, guided firmly to point
Morkel to Ponting, no run slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, dabbed behind point off the front foot
Morkel to Ponting, no run short of a length outside off, cut away to point off the back foot
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Botha to Ponting, 1 run short on middle and off, pushed off the back foot towards Duminy at deep midwicket
Botha to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on middle, driven to long-on for a single
Botha to Ponting, no run low full toss on the off stump, eased through to short cover, it's getting tougher by every over, they can't leave too many to get with too few to come now
Botha to Ponting, 1 run flighted on middle and off, pushed wide of the bowler towards long-on
Botha to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, tucked away behind square leg for a single
Botha to Ponting, no run tries to be a little cheeky, fired in on leg stump and he attempts to sweep it fine, fails to beat the keeper
Steyn to Hussey, no run short of a length outside off and moving away, makes room to slash it wide of point but is beaten by the movement
Steyn to Hussey, FOUR runs first boundary in a long time, back of a length on the off stump and moving away, waited for it and guided just wide of the keeper to beat third man

Steyn to Hussey, FOUR runs another one, there's a slip in place now but it just manages to evade him, short and wide, slashes hard, flies off the outside edge over Gibbs at slip to the third-man boundary, important runs these
Steyn to Hussey, 2 runs back of a length on middle, punches it back past the bowler for a couple more wide of mid-on, productive over so far

Steyn to Hussey, OUT but that's where it stops for Australia, banged in short on middle, goes for the pull but it's onto him a little quickly, gets the top-edge and there are fielders converging to pouch that on the leg side, Steyn is the quickest to get to it and takes a good catch running to his right
Steyn to Ponting, no run back of a length on the off stump, pushed to point off the back foot
Parnell to Hopes, 1 run good length on leg stump, turned away in front of square wide of midwicket for a single
Parnell to Ponting, 1 run short on middle, pulled away off the back foot in the direction of deep square leg
Parnell to Hopes, 1 run an attempted yorker on middle, flicked away wide of midwicket for a single
Parnell to Ponting, 1 run swinging away, good length on the off and leaving the right hander, Ponting plays it well, moving across and driving it down the ground with a full face
Parnell to Hopes, no run bouncer banged in short on middle and leg, Hopes ducks under it, one for the over
Parnell to Hopes, no run short of a good length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run tossed up by van der Merwe, a bit of width and cut away off the backfoot wide of cover
van der Merwe to Hopes, 2 runs and again a bit of room for the batsman to work with, he chops it down towards third man
van der Merwe to Hopes, 1 run closer to offstump, but the batsman backs away and dabs that towards cover point
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run driven firmly towards mid-off for a quick single
van der Merwe to Hopes, no run pushed through quickly by van der Merwe, defended back to the bowler by Hopes
van der Merwe to Hopes, 1 run full and on middle and leg, turned towards mid-on and the batsmen pinch a single
Botha to Hopes, 1 run overpitched on middle, punched towards mid-on for a single
Botha to Ponting, 1 run tossed up a touch more by Botha, Ponting tries to slam that towards long-on, doesn't quite get hold of it, and it rolls along to the long-on fielder
Botha to Hopes, 1 run driven to long-on for a single
Botha to Ponting, 1 run played with soft hands towards mid-off for a single
Botha to Hopes, no run Hopes looks to glance it down to fine leg but the ball hits his pads and drops towards square leg
Botha to Hopes, 1 run punched down the ground by Hopes for a single to retain the strike
van der Merwe to Hopes, no run pushed through, short and a bit wide, Hopes goes for an extravagant cut but misses the ball
van der Merwe to Hopes, 2 wide a wide down the leg side, Boucher can't collect and the batsmen jog through for a single
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run gets forward and eases it wide of cover
van der Merwe to Hopes, 1 leg bye down the leg side, clips his pads and they get a leg bye
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run fired in outside off, jammed towards sweeper cover
van der Merwe to Hopes, 1 run low full toss, pulled towards short midwicket
van der Merwe to Ponting, 1 run turned wide of short midwicket, the fielder picks and shies at the stumps, Ponting was just home
Steyn to Ponting, FOUR runs beautifully timed, full outside off, gets forward and drives it elegantly between mid-off and cover for a boundary

Steyn to Ponting, FOUR runs full and wide again, erring in length again, reaches forward, bends low and steers it wide of point and third man for a successive four. 100 needed off 58 now, still a tall ask

Steyn to Ponting, no run bang on target this time, fullish on middle, bowled at a decent pace as well, from wide of the crease and angling into the right hander, defended watchfully back to the bowler
Steyn to Ponting, FOUR runs Ponting's looking in prime form this over, good length on the off stump, he stood his ground and drove on the up to beat the diving mid-off, third boundary of the over

Steyn to Ponting, FOUR runs could this be the turning point? On middle and off and he shuffles across to tickle it past the short-fine fielder for another boundary, reaches his 67th ODI fifty, took him a while to get going but boy, he's looked good this over

Steyn to Ponting, OUT He's gone now! What an eventful over, could well be the decisive blow. Held it back this time and banged it in short on middle, tried to pull it over midwicket, struck it well but couldn't clear him, Albie Morkel times his jump to perfection and Australia are pegged back again
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run yorker on middle, dug out into the leg side towards midwicket
Morkel to Johnson, 1 run good length on middle and off, defended cautiously back to the bowler
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run full on middle, driven firmly towards deep midwicket for a single
Morkel to Johnson, 1 run slower ball bowled short outside off, hangs his bat out and pushes it wide of cover for a single
Morkel to Hopes, no run full on the off stump, came forward and tried to cream that over the covers, got a thick inside edge wide of the leg stump towards the keeper
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run short of a good length on the off stump, defended off the back foot towards cover
Parnell to Hopes, FOUR runs good length on the off stump, Hopes makes room and slices that over the covers for a boundary
Parnell to Hopes, 1 run round the wicket now, good length on the on the off, driven wide of Parnell for a single towards long-on
Parnell to Johnson, 1 run full on middle, gets back and turns it towards deep midwicket for a single
Parnell to Hopes, 1 run full outside off, is down on one knee and swats it to long-off
Parnell to Johnson, 1 run full on the off stump, swings across the line and drills it down to long-on
Parnell to Hopes, FOUR runs Hopes is Australia's big hope now, short on the off stump, pulled away powerfully to beat deep midwicket, they need many more of these
Morkel to Johnson, 1 run slower ball on middle and leg, chips it towards long-on for a single
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run yorker length on middle, dug out in the direction of long-on
Morkel to Hauritz, 1 run on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run attempted yorker on middle, flicked away towards deep midwicket for a single
Morkel to Hauritz, 1 run inswinger, full on the off stump, dug out wide of cover for quick single
Parnell to Hauritz, 1 leg bye short of a length on middle, hits him on the ribs as he tries to fend that away on the leg side, gets a single

Parnell to Hopes, FOUR runs good length on middle, he gets to the pitch and lofts it cleanly over the bowler's head, de Villiers flings himself to his left to pluck that out of thin air but it evades him and bounces just in front of the ropes
Parnell to Hopes, 2 runs full on middle and off, flicked away in front of square for a couple wide of deep midwicket

Parnell to Hopes, OUT good length on middle and leg but moved a hint away from the batsman, Hopes tried to clip that over the in-field on the leg side, was into the shot a little too early, lobbed off the outside-half of the bat in the direction of backward point where Gibbs took a dolly
Parnell to Hauritz, 1 run short of a length on the off, swatted over the bowler's head just short of de Villiers at long-off
Parnell to Bracken, no run on middle and off, pushed firmly towards cover, decide against the single
Steyn to Harwood, no run short of a length outside off, makes room to cut, misses
Steyn to Harwood, no run bowled at a fiery pace that, 152.1 kmph, zipped past Harwood even before he had decided to play the stroke
Steyn to Harwood, no run much fuller but almost touching 150 once again, Harwood slashes hard, predictably misses

That's all we have from here folks. Thanks for tuning in and sending us all your feedback. We'll see you again for the fifth and final ODI in Johannesburg on April 17. Until then, on behalf of all of us at Cricinfo, it's Siddhartha Talya signing off. Adios!
Herschelle Gibbs is the Man of the Match for his 110.

Three successive wins have handed South Africa the series here. Australia were in the hunt with the kind of start they got from Clarke and Haddin, who added 129. But three wickets in fairly quick succession, all to spinners turned the tide in favour of South Africa. van der Merwe was the star for them with the ball, taking three
South Africa won by 61 runs
Player of the match is Herschelle Gibbs, SA
